login.appDescription: A Mobile Application for Cardiovascular Disease Prediction
login.title: Login
login.loginError: An error occurred during login. Please try again.

validation.usernamePasswordRequired: Please enter both username and password

signup.title: Sign Up
signup.registrationSuccess: Registration successful! Please check your email for the OTP verification code.
signup.registrationError: An error occurred during registration. Please try again.

validation.fillAllFields: Please fill in all required fields
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long
validation.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters long
validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.recoverySuccess: Password recovery instructions have been sent to your email and phone number.
forgotPassword.recoveryError: Failed to recover password. Please verify your information and try again.

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

verifyOtp.title: Verify OTP
verifyOtp.description: Please enter the 6-digit OTP sent to {{email}} to continue.
verifyOtp.descriptionNoEmail: Please enter the 6-digit OTP sent to your email to continue.
verifyOtp.resendText: Didn't receive the code? Resend OTP
verifyOtp.verificationSuccess: Email verified successfully! You can now login.
verifyOtp.resendSuccess: OTP has been resent to your email!
verifyOtp.resendError: Failed to resend OTP. Please try again.

validation.emailNotFound: Email not found. Please go back and try again.

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.description: Enter your current password and choose a new secure password

requirements.title: Password Requirements:
requirements.mixCase: Mix of uppercase and lowercase letters

changePassword.error: Failed to change password. Please check your current password and try again.

validation.passwordMinLength: New password must be at least 6 characters long

predictions.title: Predictions
predictions.description: View your cardiovascular health predictions and risk assessments
predictions.noSessions: No ECG sessions found. Start a new recording to see predictions here.
predictions.errorLoadingSessionsRetry: Failed to load ECG sessions. Please try again.
predictions.errorLoadingDetails: Failed to load session details. Please try again.

ecg.title: ECG Monitor
ecg.description: Connect to Polar H10 to monitor and record your ECG signals

recording.startedMessage: Recording will automatically stop after {{samples}} samples ({{seconds}} seconds at {{rate}}Hz)
recording.stoppedWarning: Warning: Recorded only {{recorded}} samples. {{required}} samples required for prediction.
recording.completeMessage:
Successfully recorded {{samples}} samples!

You can now make a prediction.
recording.targetReached: Target reached! Recording will stop automatically.
recording.clearConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear the recorded data?

recordedData.title: Recorded ECG Data
recordedData.tapToPredict: Tap "Make Prediction" to send data for cardiovascular analysis.

prediction.noDataAvailable: No recorded data available for prediction
prediction.insufficientDataMessage:
You need exactly {{required}} samples for prediction.

Current: {{current}} samples
Required: {{required}} samples

Please record again.
prediction.confirmMessage:
Ready to submit {{samples}} ECG samples for analysis.

This may take 30-60 seconds to process.
prediction.failedMessage: Failed to process ECG data. Please try again.

modal.title: Processing ECG Analysis
modal.subtitle:
This may take 30-60 seconds...
Please do not close the app.

health.title: Health Information
health.descriptionNew: Please provide your health information for cardiovascular risk assessment
health.descriptionExisting: Review and update your health information

infoBox.message: To get accurate cardiovascular risk assessments, please fill in all required fields below. This information helps our AI model provide personalized health insights.

validation.fillAllFields: Please fill in all required fields
validation.invalidDob: Please enter a valid date of birth (age must be between 10-100 years)
validation.invalidBloodPressure: Please enter a valid blood pressure (50-300 mm Hg)

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account preferences and profile information
settings.unableToRetrieve: Unable to retrieve your profile data
